ns0:simpleDc.ns2:title: Energy feedbacks of northern high-latitude ecosystems to the climate system due to reduced snow cover during 20th century warming-IV
ns0:simpleDc.ns2:subject: climate
snow
terrestrial ecosystem model
climate

ns0:dcTerms.ns2:abstract: This data file contains data for changes in snow melt, snow return, and total snow cover duration as modeled with the Terrestrial Ecosystem Model for the area north of 50 degrees north latitude around the entire globe for the years 1910-1940. See Euskirchen et al. (2007) for full study details.
